article_title: Ron Johnson misses vote on Manchin-Toomey gun control bill
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , jessie opoien, ron johnson, gun control, manchin-toomey, joe manchin, pat toomey, gun shows, background checks, chuck grassley, democratic senatorial campaign committee, one wisconsin now, scot ross
article_metadata.author: Jessie Opoien | The Capital Times

og.description: Republican Sen. Ron Johnson was the only senator to not vote on a bipartisan gun-control proposal on Thursday, in the wake of a deadly mass shooting in San Bernardino, California.
